page.title: 05FARMING (2)
page.content: HILTON FARM When we went to Hilton farm we found out the following information = The soil around the farm is light and not the best.It is sandy and needs a lot of rain.The crops grown on the farm are wheat,oil seed rape,peas potatoes,spring barley,oats,straw and barley. Straw and barley are grown on the farm for sheep and ponies.There are 600 ewes and 900 lambs.The fields around here are very good for grazing the sheep.On the farm there are two ponies and a sheep dog.The farmer wanted to farm because he was interested in it and has been farming for 20 years now.{ { {
